abstract: Sun Microsystems offered some new details about the wrangling before last month’s deal with Oracle, describing back-and-forth talks with I.B.M. and a mystery suitor called Party B.
snippet: Sun Microsystems offered some new details about the wrangling before last month’s deal with Oracle, describing back-and-forth talks with I.B.M. and a mystery suitor called Party B.
lead_paragraph: Sun Microsystems has offered up some new details about the wrangling before last month’s $7.4 billion deal with Oracle.

headline.main: Sun’s Deal Saga and the Mystery Suitor
